verses.text: Jesus, where'er thy people meet, There they behold thy mercy seat; Where'er they seek thee, thou art found, And every place is hallowed ground;
For thou, within no walls confined, Dost dwell with those of humble mind; Such ever bring thee where they come, And, going, take thee to their home.
Great Shepherd of thy chosen few, Thy former mercies now renew; And to our waiting hearts proclaim The sweetness of thy saving name.
